name: Tangy Tuna Black Bean Quesadillas
author: SUPERTIM99
summary: This is a delicious quesadilla recipe using ingredients like low-fat sour cream, refried black beans, and whole-wheat tortillas. It's so easy to put together in less than 20 minutes and it tastes fabulous! Feel free to serve with salsa and sour cream for dipping.
ingredients: ½ cup canned sweet corn, drained
½ cup shredded Mexican cheese blend, divided
directions: Mix tuna, black beans, and sour cream together in a large bowl
Stir corn, buffalo wing sauce, garlic salt, and cumin into tuna mixture
Melt half the butter in a large skillet over medium heat; heat 1 tortilla in melted butter for 1 minute and flip
Spread half the tuna mixture over heated tortilla
Sprinkle with half the Mexican cheese; cover with another tortilla
Place a lid on the skillet and cook for 1 minute
Flip the quesadilla, cover, and cook until cheese is melted, 1 to 2 minutes
Repeat with remaining butter, tortillas, and filling
Slice quesadilla into eighths and serve a half quesadilla to each guest
